message: I'm a new user, and looking for the different conversations that are going on, and groups to join - not finding an easy way to explore either of these.  intentional?
there you can find the most popular and most recent groups
@jmdugan try clicking the Discover button in the top nav
I think it's interesting that it doesn't focus on the popular (flickr / instagram / twitter trending) and gives you the opportunity to discuss what *you* find interesting.
it's a bit buried, right now, unfortunately
@jmdugan i don't think it's intentional... just an unoptimized area of the ui
